attributes.additional_details: It should have already been done. It is appauling how long these things take... We live in 2020 and since the last petition in 2016 nothing else has been done, to help support those with coeliac disease live a life like any other.
attributes.background: Introduce a gluten frew law resteraunts must be able serve all customers of all dietry requirements.

rejection.details: This is a matter for individual restaurants as private businesses, not the UK Government or Parliament.
